reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 616/20: PHYSICAL OR MENTAL EXAMINATIONS

content.content: 1. For the purposes of clause 26 (4.10) (b) of the Act, a member shall be given at least 14 days to make written submissions in respect of an order under clause 26 (4.7) (b) of the Act to the Investigation Committee.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of clause 26 (4.10) (b) of the Act, a member shall be given at least 14 days to make written submissions in respect of an order under clause 26 (4.7) (b) of the Act to the Investigation Committee.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français
content.raw_html:
